member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Xml.Section.TextExport
member.summary: The ActiveReports for .NET Text Export Component.

remarks.para: The default character encoding used for the TextExport is ASCII. If your reports may contain internationalized characters then consider using the property to specify the or instead. The current Encodingâ€™s preamble is written out according to the rules of .

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Xml.Section.TextExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.PageDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to a text format file.
member.param: The ActiveReports PageDocument object to export.
The file name and path to save the main html file to.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

Specifies a setting name that determines if any hidden members in a Matrix ReportItem are written out. Possible values:
yes
no Default: yes

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Xml.Page.Settings.EncodingPropertyName
member.summary: Specifies the setting name that determines the text encoding to use.
member.remarks: Valid values are the code page name of the preferred encoding. For example: utf-8, utf-16, utf-32, iso-8859-1, iso-2022-jp, etc... Default: utf-8
